S04n389:1: atha tasminneva parṣadi ratnapāṇirnāma bodhisattvo mahāsattva utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat–kiṃ kāraṇaṃ bhagavan,
S04n389:4: tasya āgacchamānasyedaṃ mayedṛśaṃ nimittaṃ prādurbhūtaṃ darśitam ||
S04n389:5: atha ratnapāṇirnāma bodhisattva āha–kīdṛśāni tāni nimittāni?
S04n389:7: bhagavānāha–yadā kulaputra avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattva āgacchati,
S04n389:19: tadyathā–hastiratnaṃ maniratnaṃ aśvaratnaṃ strīratnaṃ gṛhapatiratnaṃ pariṇāyakaratnam |
S04n389:22: yadā āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sukhāvatyā lokadhātorniṣkrāntaḥ,
S04n389:24: atha ratnapāṇirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat–kasya nimittāni bhagavan?
S04n389:25: bhagavānāha–eṣa kulaputra āryāvalokiteśvaro mahāsattvo bodhisattva āgacchati,
S04n389:27: yadā sa calati tadā manoramaṃ padmavarṣaḥ patati |
S04n389:28: tadā avalokiteśvaro sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni suvarṇadaṇḍāni vaidūryanirbhāsāni gṛhītvā yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ |
S04n389:29: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavatastāni padmānyupanāmayati sma–imāni te bhagavannamitābhena tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena prahitāni |
S04n389:30: sa tathāgataḥ pṛcchati anātaṅkatāṃ laghutāṃ sukhasparśavihāritāṃ ca |
S04n389:31: tato bhagavatā padmāni gṛhītvā vāmapārśve sthāpitāni |
S04n389:32: tadā aryāvalokiteśvarasya guṇodbhāvanāṃ kurute–kīdṛśī tvayā avalokiteśvara karmabhūmirniṣpāditā sadā preteṣu avīcāvupapanneṣu?
S04n389:39: mahānarake ye upapannāḥ sattvāsteṣāṃ ca karmabhūmiṃ dṛṣṭvā tatra mayā sattvaparipāko me kṛtaḥ kartavyaśca |
S04n389:40: kṛtvā sarve ca anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayitavyāḥ |
S04n389:42: yāvatsamantāddaśabhyo digbhyaḥ sarvākṣaṇopapannāḥ sattvā arūpaviśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau na pratiṣṭhāpitā bhaveyuḥ ||
S04n389:43: athāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattva idaṃ praśnavyāhāraṃ kṛtvā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya ekānte prakāntaḥ,
